paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: Mean age 51 ± 14 years; 21 men and 18 women.
patients.phenotype: Hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis (ATTRm) with varying degrees of cardiac involvement.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Of the 13 carriers, 1 had signs of cardiac involvement.
Of the 13 carriers, 12 had no signs of cardiac involvement.

functional_data.summary: The study assessed the correlation between imaging findings and clinical symptoms in TTR mutation carriers.

variants.segregation_data: The TTR mutation segregates with disease in families, as indicated by the presence of affected individuals among carriers.
variants.additional_notes: The study included both carriers and patients with confirmed ATTRm.
key_quotes: Patients with cardiomyopathy, with or without cardiac autonomic neuropathy, had lower late HMR than similar patients without cardiomyopathy.
Of the 13 carriers, 1 had signs of cardiac involvement.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text.
